{"blocks":[{"key":"dcpp6","text":"Transfer 40 µl of the suspension to an ice-chilled electroporation cuvette and test whether arching occurs when an electrical discharge is applied. If so, wash the remainder of the cell suspension once more with ice-cold GYT medium to ensure that the conductivity of the bacterial suspension is sufficiently low","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dr36n","text":"Dispense   aliquots of the cell suspension into sterile, ice-cold microfuge , drop into a bath of liquid nitrogen, and transfer to a   freezer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":133,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"FF7B8090BA7411EDBE38A5B19F1D0290","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EA684CB0BA7411EDBE38A5B19F1D0290","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4lk7","text":"Mix an appropriate amount plasmid to an aliquot of electrocompetent cells and transfer to a pre-chilled cuvette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tehh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62td7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bd7c6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2402a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ktkq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5gjtk","text":"100 pg pUC19 plasmid is appropriate in most cases, but a specific amount plasmid depend on many different factors and have to be optimized","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":76690,"title":"S. O. C. medium","title_html":"S. O.
